articles.title: These 80-Million-Year-Old Sea Creatures Look Shockingly Similar to Buckyballs - ScienceAlert

articles.title: Trailblazing NASA Mathematician Katherine Johnson Dies at 101 - The Daily Beast
articles.description: Johnson calculated the trajectory of man’s first trip to the moon, and her work remains vital to human spaceflight today.
